name: Physalis
description:
Physalis is an endless swimmer game!

You, as a bubble, try to rise to the surface while surviving through the ocean's many dangers that try to pop you. Your score is the distance you managed to swim.

Some enemies can pop you instantly but not all enemies deal damage to you. The further you travel the more you shrink so replenish your life by absorbing other bubbles or you might even pop by yourself!

Controls: Use A/D or Arrow Keys to Move, Space to Dodge

Made for Minijam 33
